post.body: you're welcome!
the countdown to proof of your ability to spawn is on!
just read your blog post. Comic Press's new styles are a lot more smooth right now than they've been in ages.
I'm also heading up Saturday, maybe staying until Sunday, but need a place for me and Kendra to crash (might not be at NYCC Sunday).
shaft as in a lot of work, getting fired, or an angry black cop?
that is awesome. Now to decide, is it more dangerous to look at this while redesigning stuff, or more danger to not look?
oh, if you're still there, check out Rockin Baja Lobster for dinner.
I don't have as many fancy-dancy designer resources as @rosscott, so it was a first sight for me. Oh, and yeah, comicking.
that is a find I intend to exploit, and soon.
I am clearly No. 6. (fans of 1960s british sci-fi just got that joke).
yes, 10 My Little Ponies are prancing their way to my house. Where I will do awful things to them (is a sekret projekt).
Ug. @breegeek is the winner. http://tinyurl.com/2cb94r/Detail&product_id=21197
sadly, @auilix is closer than @Ghostfreehood.
Some day I'll fess up to what I'm buying 10 of from Hasbro right now.
there is a truly awful idea in my head that will be done in time for the Katsucon Art Show.
game is starting late. cmon tipoff, I gots work to do.
Yep, a bio about myself that I wrote is making me laugh: http://tinyurl.com/8yrl25
Awake. Feels too early because I was up until 4 a.m. writing some scripts. Hoping that my sleep schedule can get almost normal by next week.
Off to dinner reservations for two. BTW, it's my anniversary.
hmmm. I do believe I need to write some things now. Now that I'm done, um, writing. Still, what I have written entertains/pays me greatly.
